hero.description: I'm passionate about User Experience, Responsive Devlopment, Accessibility and dedicated to my work. Based in Fundão, Portugal.

about.title: About me
about.description: Hi! My name is Bárbara Castilho. I'm a Front-end web developer passionate and dedicated about web development and the creativity that comes out of it, interested in continuous self-developing, looking forward to improve my skills and expanding my knowledge.
